Description_lang: Steals and equips the target's armor.  Reduces their damage dealt by $s2%, and maximum health by up to $s1%, and increases yours by the same amount. Lasts $208535d.
AuraDescription_lang: $?$w3>0[Wearing stolen armor.Maximum health increased by $m3%.Damage dealt increased by $m4%.][Armor stolen.Maximum Health decreased by $m3%.Damage dealt decreased by $m4%.]
